select player.`player_id`, player.`player_tag`, player.`avatar`, player.`nation`, player.`region_id`, player.`main_character`, player.`main_character_color`, cspr.`cspr` from player left join cspr on cspr.player_id = player.player_id where cspr.`season` = #{season} and player.`region_id` = #{regionId} ORDER BY cspr.`ranking`
limit #{limit}
